text:
Rudolph Valentino Regalado (May 21, 1930 - February 12, 2018) was an American Major League Baseball player. He was an infielder for the Cleveland Indians from 1954 to 1956, and played in the 1954 World Series. He was born in Los Angeles, California.
Regalado died on February 12, 2018 in San Diego, California of a pulmonary embolism at the age of 87.
